title: pOpu hOgaNa
sahitya:
pOpu hOgaNa bArO pOpu hOgaNa


caraNam 1    jAnhavIya tIravante janakarAyana kumAriyante tanuvu etti muridavaige jAnakiya koDuvarante
    caraNam 2    kuNDalIya nagaravante bhISmakarAyana tanayanante shishupAlana ollaLante ninage Ole baredante
    caraNam 3    kauravaru pANDavaru vettavADi sOdarante rAjyavellA biTTArante ranga viTTala barabEkante
